pages.text: $(b)Silver Equipment$() is your first step into magical crafting. All silver armor and tools are created using $(violet)Smithing Templates$().$(br2)You'll need:$(br)• Silver Ingots$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Base item (iron or diamond)

pages.title: Silver Template
pages.text: $(l)Crafting Silver Template:$()$(br2)Combine:$(br)• 4x Silver Ingot$(br)• 1x Diamond$(br2)This template is reusable for all silver smithing recipes!
Upgrade iron helmet to silver helmet at a smithing table.

pages.title: Silver Armor Set
pages.text: $(l)Full Armor Set:$()$(br2)• $(violet)Helmet$() - Iron Helmet base$(br)• $(violet)Chestplate$() - Iron Chestplate base$(br)• $(violet)Leggings$() - Iron Leggings base$(br)• $(violet)Boots$() - Iron Boots base$(br2)Each requires silver template and silver ingots.

pages.title: Silver Tools
pages.text: $(l)Silver Tools:$()$(br2)• $(violet)Silver Pickaxe$() - Diamond Pickaxe base$(br)• $(violet)Needle$() - Iron Sword base$(br2)Silver tools have enhanced durability and efficiency!
